plot: A satirical story about the change of name and policy of the Italian Communist Party in 1989, as seen through the eyes of the people of a village in Tuscany.
title: Zitti e mosca
plot_es: A satirical story about the change of name and policy of the Italian Communist Party in 1989, as seen through the eyes of the people of a village in Tuscany.
plot_en: A satirical story about the change of name and policy of the Italian Communist Party in 1989, as seen through the eyes of the people of a village in Tuscany.
